name: シーケンス図
content:
@startuml
skinparam sequenceArrowThickness 2
skinparam roundcorner 20
skinparam maxmessagesize 60
skinparam sequenceParticipant underline

actor User
participant "First Class" as A
participant "Second Class" as B
participant "Last Class" as C

User -> A: DoWork
activate A

A -> B: Create Request
activate B

B -> C: DoWork
activate C
C --> B: WorkDone
destroy C

B --> A: Request Created
deactivate B

A --> User: Done
deactivate A

@enduml

name: ユースケース図
クラス図
content: @startuml namespace game { class BaseClass note top of BaseClass In java, every class extends this one. end note } namespace game.player #DDDDDD { interface Person { {static} - String name {static} - Int age -- encrypted -- {static} - String password .. Getter .. + getName() + getAge() + getPassword() .. Setter .. + setName() + setAge() + setPassword() .. Abstract .. {abstract} + doSomething() } class User { {static} - String name {static} - Int age {static} - String password .. Getter .. + getName() + getAge() + getPassword() .. Setter .. + setName() + setAge() + setPassword() .. Override .. + doSomething() } class Leader{ {static} - String name {static} - Int age -- encrypted -- {static} - String password .. Getter .. + getName() + getAge() + getPassword() .. Setter .. + setName() + setAge() + setPassword() .. Override .. + doSomething() == Original == + doLeaderJob() } Person <|-- User Person <|-- Leader Leader "1" o-- "0..*" User BaseClass <|- Leader BaseClass <|- User } @enduml

name: アクティビティ図
状態図
content:
@startuml
[*] -> State1
State1 --> State2 : Succeeded
State1 --> [*] : Aborted
State2 --> State3 : Succeeded
State2 --> [*] : Aborted
state State3 {
  state "Accumulate Enough Data" as long1
  long1 : Just a test
  [*] --> long1
  long1 --> long1 : New Data
  long1 --> ProcessData : Enough Data
  State2 --> [H]: Resume
}
tate3 --> State2 : Pause
tate2 --> State3[H*]: DeepResume
tate3 --> State3 : Failed
tate3 --> [*] : Succeeded / Save Result
tate3 --> [*] : Aborted
@enduml

name: マインドマップ図
ガントチャート
content:
@startgantt
language ja
saturday are closed
sunday are closed

Project starts 2021-01-01
[Prototype design end] as [TASK1] lasts 19 days
[TASK1] is colored in Lavender/LightBlue
[Testing] lasts 14 days
[TASK1]->[Testing]

2021-01-18 to 2021-01-22 are colored in salmon
@endgantt
